title: Tailoring of structural, morphological, electrical, and magnetic properties of LaMn1−xFexO3 ceramics
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23592-23605
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04931D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Priyanka Thakur, Kais Iben Nassar, Deepak Kumar, Pawan Kumar, Prianka Sharma, Vineet Tirth, Ali Saad Alosaimy, Ali Algahtani, Manel Essid, Madan Lal
This study undertakes a comparative analysis of the structural, morphological, electrical, and magnetic characteristics of Fe-doped LaMnO3 ceramics.
